img_text: "Democrats have been known to MONKEY around with elections." - Barack Obama Sep 4, 2008 "Donald Trump threw a MONKEY wrench with the wall." - Chuck Schumer Apr 24, 2017 "No one has ever been allowed to MONKEY around with our electoral system." - Dianne Feinstein Sep 23, 2016 FWD: DESANTIS DID NOTHING WRONG, SWEATY!
